page.title: 04PRIMARY SECTOR EMPLOYMENT
page.content: { Agriculture and Horticulture}account for the smallest number of jobs. Machinery is much used on the farms and only about{20}people are permanently employed in farming. Even with casual labour included the number employed does not go above{50. The large fruit farm near{Toll Bar {End}operates the{Pick Your Own}system so large numbers of pickers are not needed. { Steetley quarry}employ{15}workers to operate the extraction, moving and sorting of the sand and gravel; and a further{15}in administration. A much larger, though varying, number are employed as drivers supplying sand, gravel and{Readymix Concrete}to the local area. At present with the low level of building the number of drivers is about{40.
